message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with image captioning and visual question answering, which are both tasks related to computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a new attention mechanism, which involves machine learning and optimization techniques, making cs.CL (Computation and Language) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper achieves state-of-the-art results, indicating a strong focus on performance evaluation, which aligns with cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper involves image and text retrieval, which falls under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
